ygData.subject: What lies ahead.

DarkMouse:;

She woke up and stretched. She had grown accustom to sleeping in 
mouse mode. She walked out of her room and headed towards the bridge. 
She looked and saw Galvatron still sleeping in the chair. She smirked 
and tried not to laugh. Let sleeping bots lie, she thought.

She walked over to the holo-projector and looked at the bases. She 
saw her short time base, the Black Fortress. She sighed and started 
to miss her predacon friends from past days.  She looked over her 
shoulder to Galvatron. She sighed. She wanted to learn more about 
this ship.  She sorted out priorities in her mind and smiled as she 
got things straightened out. 

She sat down at the projector console. She put her hand over the hand 
plate, but nothing happened.  She relized she would have to get a 
copy of Galvatron's handprints inorder to activate the equipment. She 
would also have to get his voice programmed into her synthesizer in 
order to activate some of the other stuff in this ship.  Once that 
was done, she would be able to run things. Like she had always been 
able to do with the other bases she had lived in. She never felt safe 
unless she had run over most of the systems and the defence gear. She 
smiled at her plans on how to get this base to respond to her.  She 
would try the upfront approach first. If that didn't work, well, she 
was a pred after all. She knew she could get it done. She glanced 
back at Galvatron. She got up and walked over to him. "Say, can you 
show me how to operate the long range scanners for incoming bots?" 
knowing he'd be awakened, but she could calm him down if he got mad. 
She survived Megatron, she could survive anything.
